comments:
3.3 RC2

Fixed. Patch attached.

Target:  3.3 RC3
Patch:   patch_189422_2007-05-28_13-17.txt

Couldn't reproduce the bug.  The file being acted upon is the MANIFEST.MF.

Nevertheless, I added NULL guards in the workspace bundle model for the 
following scenarios:

(1) Getting the installation location
(2) Checking if the file is in sync
(3) Updating the time stamp

Reviewers:

* Committer:  Brian
* Committer:  Dejan
* Component Lead:  Wassim
Looks good to me.  Thanks for taking care of that Mike.

Thank-you reviewers.
Patch released to HEAD.
